title: Saas Venue Management Platform - Cloud App
text: Questions Business Summary Perfect for a business development team to take an exciting and mission critical software as a service Company and make sales calls across the country or in your local market in the nightlife and entertainment industry. Business development in South Beach? NYC? Vegas? Sweet! Sellers have over $3MM in R&D outflows to generate the platform in today's iteration, and have spared no expense in terms of functionality, redundancy, and UI friendliness across the entertainment / management user base. A robust processing powerhouse, the solution provides comprehensive customer relationship management (CRM) that ties to the Point of Sale to manage customer interaction and spend. This is a cross-platform, mobile-first solution that manages all important reservation, sales & guest list metrics with all revenues and related #'s updating in real time. Subscription based model on a per user basis, currently employed by a roster of clients including some with nationwide brand awareness and cachet. Platform is currently being enhanced to complementary hospitality segments including high-end restaurants, event ticketing venues, among others. NDA is required for Company URL and first round due diligence package on file with Ace Business Brokers. Detailed Information Facilities: This is a portable nationwide opportunity, currently with one office that is in Southern California, but is not necessary or absorbed with the subject transaction. Competition: There are a few direct competitors on the market, but the functionality contained within this software surpasses the other offerings. Growth & Expansion: The time is now to focus on business development. All investments have mainly been in the development and R&D of the product up to this point. Financing: If the price and deal structure is right. Support & Training: Long term transition assistance possible. Reason for Selling: Focus on core software business in healthcare. Financials
